thread.title: BRUCE WARHANIK
thread.title_full: Easy Comforts reviewed by BRUCE WARHANIK

author: BRUCE WARHANIK
title: BRUCE WARHANIK
text:
After shopping & searching numerous places for replacement wallet inserts that fit my wallet, I finally found the item at Easy Comforts. It was like looking for a needle in a haystack but they did have exactly what I wanted.
Good service, price, and knowledgeable reps at their call center.
The only possible minus being that it took a few days longer than what was advertised for expected delivery.
